channel.title: Server crashes every X mins
channel.description:
The problem is sometimes I want to leave my server on for 2+ hours or so, but because of this dumb error it keeps crashing around every 45 min- 1 hour!
Here is a picture of the error
[IMG]http://i156.photobucket.com/albums/t16/fire_2008/CaptureWiz004.jpg[/img]
And to anyone thats going to say just get an auto restarter- it'll fix the problem.
Ok well I don't have an auto restarter and sometimes it crashes within 20 mins
